Discuss any special scenarios, such as what happens when \( x_0 \) equals \( \sqrt{a} \).

Compute the limit of the sequence as \( n \) approaches infinity, expressing it in terms of \( x_0 \) and \( a \) if a closed form can be established.

Formulate a general statement or theorem about the convergence and limit of the sequence based on the accumulated analysis.
